p: The treatment of SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells with (1600–50 µg/mL) of 1,8-cineole and Laurus nobilis essential oil for 24 h resulted in a low cytotoxic activity. 1,8-Cineole and essential oil showed an IC 50 > 2000 g/mL and IC 50 = 47,106 µg/mL, respectively. However, the treatment with essential oil resulted in a stronger cytotoxicity (IC 50 < 500 µg/mL) ( Figure 1).
